sentences.en: "Ha!" It was a cross between a laugh and a bark.
sentences.cn: “哈！”那声音听起来既像在笑又像在叫。

sentences.en: a daredevil who laughed at danger.
sentences.cn: 鲁莽大胆的蔑视危险

sentences.en: all the critics had laughed at him — well, the laugh was on them now.
sentences.cn: 所有的批评家都曾嘲笑他——啊，现在他们可成了嘲笑对象了。

sentences.en: Bev made her laugh, the way she was always clowning around.
sentences.cn: 贝夫用她一贯滑稽耍宝的方式逗她发笑。

sentences.en: Do not hesitate to laugh at anything you find amusing.
sentences.cn: 只要觉得好笑就尽管笑。

sentences.en: For no reason at all the two men started to laugh.
sentences.cn: 两个人莫名其妙地开始大笑。

sentences.en: For what do we live, but to make sport for our neighbours, and laugh at them in our turn?
sentences.cn: 我们活着是为了什么？不就是给邻居当笑柄，再反过来笑他们。

sentences.en: He burst into a high-pitched laugh, as though he'd said something funny.
sentences.cn: 他突然放声大笑，好像讲了什么好笑的事似的。

sentences.en: He couldn’t help it; he burst out laughing (= suddenly started laughing ).
sentences.cn: 他情不自禁地放声大笑起来。

sentences.en: He gave a short laugh.
sentences.cn: 他笑了一声。

sentences.en: He was falsely jovial, with his booming, mirthless laugh.
sentences.cn: 他低声苦笑了几声，装出快乐的样子。

sentences.en: He’s one of the few writers who can make me laugh out loud.
sentences.cn: 有几位作家能让我放声大笑，他是其中之一。

sentences.en: His laugh-a-minute image is just a front to hide his deep unhappiness.
sentences.cn: 他滑稽可笑的形象只是用来掩饰内心深处痛苦的假面具。

sentences.en: it's a laugh a minute when Lois gets together with her dad.
sentences.cn: 洛伊斯和爸爸在一起真逗人乐。

sentences.en: laughed off any suggestion that her career was over.
sentences.cn: 对有关她事业生涯已经结束的暗示置之不理

sentences.en: Lysenko gave a deep rumbling laugh at his own joke.
sentences.cn: 李森科说笑话的时候自己咯咯直乐。

sentences.en: Maria looked at him and laughed.
sentences.cn: 玛丽亚看着他大笑起来。

sentences.en: Nora laughed so much that she nearly cried.
sentences.cn: 诺拉笑得眼泪都快出来了。

sentences.en: She tried to laugh, and the sound was harsh and strident.
sentences.cn: 她想笑，但声音听起来尖锐刺耳。

sentences.en: The blunt comment made Richard laugh in spite of himself.
sentences.cn: 这番率直的话让理查德不由自主地大笑起来。

sentences.en: The British don't laugh at the same jokes as the French.
sentences.cn: 法国人觉得好笑的笑话，英国人不一定会笑。

sentences.en: The joke got a big laugh, which encouraged me to continue.
sentences.cn: 我的笑话引来哄堂大笑，这使我深受鼓舞，继续往下讲。

sentences.en: They laugh so hard they double up with laughter.
sentences.cn: 他们捧腹大笑，直不起身来。

sentences.en: Tony was laughing so hard he had to steady himself on the table.
sentences.cn: 托尼笑得太厉害了，靠着桌子才能让自己站稳。

sentences.en: vandals and muggers who laugh in the face of the law.
sentences.cn: 嘲笑法律的涂鸦者和抢劫犯。

sentences.en: We've both had a good laugh about the accident despite what's happened.
sentences.cn: 虽然出了意外，但我俩事后都一笑置之。

words.tran_cn: 笑者；好笑的一边倒比赛

phrases.phrase: be laughing all the way to the bank

phrases.tran_cn: [美国俚语]为了取乐，当作消遣，借以开心
笑到最后，最后得到证明

phrases.phrase: he who laughs last laughs longest

phrases.tran_cn: 不信任的嘲笑；大声狂笑；哈哈大笑
用笑驱除恐惧等；付之一笑；谈笑中消磨时间
一笑置之：把……当作滑稽可笑的琐事而置之不理

phrases.phrase: laugh on the other side of one's face ( 或北美

phrases.tran_cn: 因可笑而鄙视，一笑置之

phrases.phrase: the laugh is on me (或you, him等)
phrases.tran_cn: 我（你、他等）成了嘲笑对象

trans.tran_cn: 笑声，令人开心的事物/人
trans.tran_en: the act of laughing or the sound you make when you laugh

trans.tran_cn: 笑，嘲笑，笑着说，处于有利地位
trans.tran_en: to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
to make sounds with your voice, usually while you are smiling, because you think something is funny
